en: Jenny is looking out of the window.
Danny is singing a song to your mother.

en: Please don't jump on the train.
The woman is reading the newspaper.
They arrive at the train station.
We are going on a trip.
Mr. Li drives them to the train station.
cn: 李先生开车送他们去火车站。

en: We are going to the Great Wall.
I want to buy a gift for you.
They are going to Beijing today.
There are many people in the park.
A child is flying a kite.
Some old men are doing Tai Chi.
The Palace Museum is about six hundred years old.
cn: 故宫大约有六百年历史。

en: The palace is red and yellow.
The Great Wall is about two thousand years old.
cn: 长城大约有两千年历史。

en: The Great Wall is about six thousand kilometres.
I want to buy a scarf for my mother.
Jenny buys a scarf for her mother.

en: She buys some tea for her father.

en: You can't walk to the hotel with that!

en: I want to buy a gift for my friend.
What do you want to buy?
Let's put it on the wall.
Danny falls at the Palace Museum.
He is afraid of the cars.
Don't be afraid. I can help you.
He is happy to see the panda.
We are lucky to see the Great Wall.
cn: 我们很幸运能看到长城。

en: He is a true man now.
cn: 他现在是个真正的男子汉了。

en: Don't draw on the Great Wall.
Let's keep it clean and beautiful.
cn: 让我们保持它干净美丽。

en: We need to take a bus.
The restaurant is across the street.
There are too many cars and buses.
We go to the Great Wall by bus.
We are on the way back to the hotel.
We are on our way to the hotel.
Let's fly a kite on the square.
cn: 让我们在广场上放风筝吧。

en: This is easy. This is difficult!
We are going to the Summer Palace tomorrow.
The Bird's Nest is very big.
I want to send this postcard to my mum and dad.
cn: 我想把这张明信片寄给我爸爸妈妈。

en: This postcard has a picture of the Palace Museum.
cn: 这张明信片上有故宫的图片。

en: Where do you write on a postcard?
Where do you put the address?
You put the address on the right.
Put the address on the right.
I want to write a letter to my uncle.
This is a letter. We write it on paper.
cn: 这是一封信我们写在纸上。

en: I want to send an email to my father.
cn: 我想给爸爸发一封电子邮件。

en: There is a computer in the room.
Don't forget to write my name.
I'm writing an email to Steven.
cn: 我正在给史蒂文写邮件。

en: Turn left at the traffic lights.
You will see the hotel on the right.
How can I get to the train station?
The post office is next to the bank.
We are having fun in Beijing.
cn: 我们在北京玩得很开心。

en: Beijing is a very big city.
Mum and I will go back home tomorrow.
Don't forget to write to us.
